data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 1,213 believers in Offaly.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Offaly, Ireland
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 64 neighbors who are far from you in Offaly. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Offaly, Ireland.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Offaly a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Offaly. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Offaly, Ireland need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Offaly, Ireland to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist
